name: Everything Does That!
description:
The Game:

Everything Does That!  is a First Person Puzzle Platformer where  nothing does what it should! 

Guns heal.

Healthpacks kill.

Use your wits to solve the puzzles in this non-sensical world.

Theme  interpretation:

This was made for BUET IEEE Game jam 2023. The theme was "It shouldn't do that". We flipped that on its head and made a game where nothing does what it should and instead does everything else.

Tips: ************************************************* Do not be alarmed by the blank screen. The loading bar does not appear in the webGL ver. It will load after a while. ************************************************* move: WASD Jump: Spacebar Shoot: LMB Use Item: RMB Pause: ESC Credits: Programming/Level Design: 

B-DeshiDev
